title: Client minimizing when clicking on the bottom of the screen
body:
I'm having an issue during games when I click towards the bottom of my screen the client will minimizing. This happens when running on full screen.
Any ideas?

replies.body: Are you running league on a mac?  If not, what is your in-game video setting set to; fullscreen or something else?  What happens if you toggle it to Borderless?  Let me know!
